select
,(select s.shop_name from shop s where wo.shop_id=s.shop_id) shop_name ,case when wo.produce_order_id is not null then(select batch_number from produce_order po WHERE po.id=wo.produce_order_id) else null end produceOrderBatchNumber, ifnull((select sum(woss.warehousing_quantity) from warehousing_order_shop_sku woss where woss.warehousing_order_id=wo.id),0) warehousingQuantityTotal from warehousing_order wo
and shop_id =#{shopId} and production_time>= #{productionTimeStart} and production_time < DATE_ADD(date(#{productionTimeEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and batch_number like concat('%',#{batchNumber},'%')
and exists (select 1 from warehousing_order_shop_sku woss where woss.warehousing_order_id=wo.id and woss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from warehousing_order_shop_sku woss,shop_sku ss,sku s where woss.warehousing_order_id=wo.id and woss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id and ss.sku_id=s.sku_id and s.sku like concat('%',#{sku},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from produce_order po where wo.produce_order_id=po.id and po.batch_number like concat('%',#{produceOrderBatchNumber},'%'))
and status=#{status}
order by wo.create_time desc

mapper.select: select s.`shop_name` shopName,wo.`create_time` createTime,wo.`warehousing_time` warehousingTime,wo.`status`,wo.`type`,case when wo.produce_order_id is not null then(select batch_number from produce_order po WHERE po.id=wo.produce_order_id) else null end produceOrderBatchNumber,wo.batch_number batchNumber,sku.`sku`,ss.shop_sku shopSku,woss.warehousing_quantity warehousingquantity from warehousing_order wo left join shop s on wo.shop_id=s.shop_id left join warehousing_order_shop_sku woss on wo.id=woss.`warehousing_order_id` left join shop_sku ss on woss.`shop_sku_id`=ss.`shop_sku_id` left join sku on ss.`sku_id`=sku.`sku_id`
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `shop_sku_storage_location`(shop_sku_id,storage_location_id,create_by) SELECT DISTINCT woss.`shop_sku_id`,wosssl.storage_location_id,#{dealUserId} FROM `warehousing_order_shop_sku` woss,`warehousing_order_shop_sku_storage_location` wosssl WHERE woss.`warehousing_order_id`=#{id} AND woss.`id`=wosssl.`warehousing_order_shop_sku_id` AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM `shop_sku_storage_location` sssl WHERE sssl.shop_sku_id=woss.`shop_sku_id` AND sssl.storage_location_id=wosssl.storage_location_id )
